SA20vasvvmsu:0_2: cittamātraṃ bho jinaputrā yad uta traidhātukam iti sūtrāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:0_3: cittaṃ mano vijñānaṃ vijñaptiś ceti paryāyāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:3_1: na ca kṛtyakriyā yuktā vijñaptir yadi nārthataḥ // 2 //
SA20vasvvmsu:4_0: kim uktaṃ bhavati / yadi vinā rūpādyarthena rūpādivijñaptir utpadyate na rūpādyarthāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:4_1: kasmāt kvacid deśa utpadyate na sarvatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:4_2: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid utpadyate na sarvadā /
SA20vasvvmsu:4_3: taddeśakālapratiṣṭhitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ saṃtānāniyama utpadyate na kevalam ekasya /
SA20vasvvmsu:4_5: kasmād yat taimirikaiḥ keśabhramarādi dṛśyate tena keśādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:4_6: yad annapānavastraviṣāyudhādi svapne dṛśyate tenānnādikriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:4_7: gandharvanagareṇāsattvān nagarakriyā na kriyate na ca tad anyair na kriyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:4_8: tasmād asadabhāvāvabhāsane deśakālaniyamaḥ saṃtānāniyamaḥ kṛtyakriyā ca na yujyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:6_0: svapna iva svapnavat / kathaṃ tāvat / svapne vināpy arthena kvacid eva deśe kiṃcid bhramarārāmastrīpurūṣādikaṃ dṛśyate na sarvatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:6_1: tatraiva ca deśe kadācid dṛśyate na sarvakālam iti siddho vināpy arthena deśakālaniyamaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:8_1: siddha iti vartate / pretānām iva pretavat / kathaṃ siddhaḥ samaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:10_0: pūyapūrṇā nadī pūyanadī / ghṛtaghaṭavat / tulyakarmavipākāvasthā hi pretāḥ sarve 'pi pūyapūrṇāṃ nadīṃ paśyanti naika eva /
SA20vasvvmsu:10_1: yathā pūyapūrṇām evaṃ mūtrapurīṣādipūrṇāṃ daṇḍāsidharaiś ca puruṣair adhiṣṭhitām ity ādigrahaṇena /
SA20vasvvmsu:10_2: evaṃ saṃtānāniyamo vijñaptinām asaty apy arthe siddhaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:12_0: siddha iti veditavyaṃ / yathā svapne dvayasamāpattim antareṇa śukravisargalakṣaṇaḥ svapnopaghātaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:12_1: evaṃ tāvad anyānyair dṛṣṭāntair deśakālaniyamādicatuṣṭayaṃ siddhaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:14_0: siddham iti veditavyaṃ / narakeṣv iva narakavat / kathaṃ siddhaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:16_0: yathā hi narakeṣu nārakāṇāṃ narakapālādidarśanaṃ deśakālaniyamena siddhaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:16_2: sarveṣāṃ ca naikasyaiva taiś ca tadbādhanaṃ siddham asatsv api narakapālādiṣu samānasvakarmavipākādhipatyāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:16_3: tathānyatrāpi sarvam etad deśakālaniyamādicatuṣtayaṃ siddham iti veditavyaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:17_0: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ narakapālās te ca śvāno vāyasāś ca sattvā neṣyante /
SA20vasvvmsu:17_1: ayogāt / na hi te nārakā yujyante / tathaiva tadduḥkhāpratisaṃvedanāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:17_2: parasparaṃ yātayatām ime nārakā ime narakapālā iti vyavasthā na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:17_3: tulyākṛtipramāṇabalānāṃ ca parasparaṃ yātayatāṃ na tathā bhayaṃ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:17_4: dāhaduḥkhaṃ ca pradīptāyām ayomayyāṃ bhūmāv asahamānāḥ kathaṃ tatra parān yātayeyuḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:17_7: evaṃ narakeṣu tiryakpretaviśeṣāṇāṃ narakapālādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:18_0: tiraścāṃ saṃbhavaḥ svarge yathā na narake tathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:18_1: na pretānāṃ yatas tajjaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti te // 5 //
SA20vasvvmsu:19_0: ye hi tiryañcaḥ svarge saṃbhavanti te tadbhājanalokasukhasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā tatra saṃbhūtās tajjaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:19_1: na caiva narakapālādayo nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:19_2: tasmān na tiraścāṃ saṃbhavo yukto nāpi pretānāṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:20_0: teṣāṃ tarhi [Vvs_5] nārakāṇāṃ karmabhis tatra bhūtaviśeṣāḥ saṃbhavanti varṇākṛtipramāṇabalaviśiṣṭā ye narakapālādisaṃjñāṃ pratilabhante /
SA20vasvvmsu:20_1: tathā ca pariṇamanti / yad dvidhāṃ hastavikṣepādikriyāṃ kurvanto dṛśyante bhayotpādanārthaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:20_2: yathā meṣākṛtayaḥ parvatā āgacchanto gacchanto 'yaḥśālmalīvane ca kaṇṭakā adhomukhībhavanta ūrddhvamukhībhavantaś ceti /
SA20vasvvmsu:21_0: yadi tatkarmabhis tatra bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavas tathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:21_1: iṣyate pariṇāmaś ca kiṃ vijñānasya neṣyate // 6 //
SA20vasvvmsu:22_0: vijñānasyaiva tatkarmabhis tathā pariṇāmaḥ kasmān neṣyate kiṃ punar bhūtāni kalpyante //
SA20vasvvmsu:23_1: tatraiva neṣyate yatra vāsanā kiṃ nu kāraṇaṃ // 7 //
SA20vasvvmsu:24_0: yena hi karmaṇā nārakāṇāṃ tatra tādṛśo bhūtānāṃ saṃbhavaḥ kalpyate pariṇāmaś ca tasya karmaṇo vāsanā teṣāṃ vijñānasaṃtānasaṃniviṣṭā nānyatra /
SA20vasvvmsu:24_1: yatraiva ca vāsanā tatraiva tasyāḥ phalaṃ tādṛśo vijñānapariṇāmaḥ kiṃ neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:24_2: yatra vāsanā nāsti tatra tasyāḥ phalaṃ kalpyata iti kim atra kāraṇaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:25_0: āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ / yadi vijñānam eva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ syān na rūpādiko 'rthas tadā rūpādyāyatanāstitvaṃ bhagavatā noktaṃ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:27_0: yathāsti sattva upapāduka ity uktaṃ bhagavatā abhiprāyavaśāc cittasaṃtatyanucchedam āyatyām abhipretya /
SA20vasvvmsu:28_0: nāstīha sattva ātmā vā dharmās tv ete sahetukāḥ
SA20vasvvmsu:29_0: iti vacanāt / evaṃ rūpādyāyatanāstitvam apy uktaṃ bhagavatā taddeśanāvineyajanam adhikṛtyety ābhiprāyikaṃ tad vacanaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:32_0_0: kim uktaṃ bhavati / rūpapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād
SA20vasvvmsu:32_0_1: utpadyate tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā vijñapteś cakṣūrūpāyatanatvena
SA20vasvvmsu:32_1_0: evaṃ yāvat spraṣṭavyapratibhāsā vijñaptir yataḥ svabījāt pariṇāmaviśeṣaprāptād utpadyate
SA20vasvvmsu:32_1_1: tac ca bījaṃ yat pratibhāsā ca sā te tasyā kāyaspraṣṭavyāyatanatvena yathākranaṃ
SA20vasvvmsu:33_0: evaṃ punar abhiprāyavaśena deśayitvā ko guṇāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:35_2: na tu kaścid eko draṣṭāsti na yāvan mantety evaṃ viditvā ye pudgalanairātmyadeśanāvineyās te pudgalanairātmyaṃ praviśanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:37_2: vijñaptimātram idaṃ rūpādidharmapratibhāsam utpadyate na tu rūpādilakṣaṇo dharmaḥ ko 'py astīti viditvā /
SA20vasvvmsu:37_3: yadi tarhi sarvathā dharmo nāsti tad api vijñaptimātraṃ nāstīti kathaṃ tarhi vyavasthāpyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:37_4: na khalu sarvathā dharmo nāstīty evaṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśo bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:39_0: yo bālair dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo grāhyagrāhakādiḥ parikalpatas tena kalpitenātmanā teṣāṃ nairātmyaṃ na tv anabhilāpyenātmanā yo buddhānāṃ viṣaya iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:39_1: evaṃ vijñaptimātrasyāpi vijñaptyantaraparikalpitenātmanā nairātmyapraveśāt vijñaptimātravyavasthāpanayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyapraveśo bhavati na tu tadastitvāpavādāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:39_2: itarathā hi vijñapter api vijñaptyantaram arthaḥ syād iti vijñaptimātratvaṃ na sidhyetārthavatītvād vijñaptīnāṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:40_0: kathaṃ punar idaṃ pratyetavyam anenābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā rūpādyāyatanāstitvam uktaṃ na punaḥ santy eva tāni yāni rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayībhavanti iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:41_0: na tad ekaṃ na cānekaṃ viṣayaḥ paramāṇuśaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:41_1: na ca te saṃhatā yasmāt paramāṇur na sidhyati // 11 //
SA20vasvvmsu:42_0: iti / kim uktaṃ bhavati / yat tadrūpādikam āyatanaṃ rūpādivijñaptīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viṣayaḥ syāt tad ekaṃ vā syād yathāvayavirūpaṃ kalpyate vaiśeṣikaiḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:42_1: anekaṃ vā paramāṇuśaḥ / saṃhatā vā ta eva paramāṇavaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:42_2: na tāvad ekaṃ viṣayo bhavaty avayavebhyo 'nyasyāvayavirūpasya kvacid apy agrahaṇāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:42_5: yasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati /
SA20vasvvmsu:45_0: ṣaḍbhyo digbhyaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ paramāṇubhir yugapad yoge sati paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā prāpnoti /
SA20vasvvmsu:47_0: atha ya evaikasya paramāṇor deśaḥ sa eva ṣaṇṇāṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:47_1: tena sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraḥ syāt parasparāvyatirekād iti na kaścit piṇḍo dṛśyaḥ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:48_1: mā bhūd eṣa doṣaprasaṅgaḥ / saṃhatās tu parasparaṃ saṃyujyanta iti kāśmīravaibhāṣikās ta idaṃ praṣṭavyāḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:48_2: yaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ saṃghāto na sa tebhyo 'rthāntaram iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:52_0: atha saṃghātā apy anyonyaṃ na saṃyujyante /
SA20vasvvmsu:52_1: na tarhi paramāṇūnāṃ niravayavatvāt saṃyogo na sidhyatīti vaktavyaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:52_3: tasmāt paramāṇur ekaṃ dravyaṃ na sidhyati /
SA20vasvvmsu:52_4: yadi ca paramāṇoḥ saṃyoga iṣyate yadi vā neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:54_0: anyo hi paramāṇoḥ pūrvadigbhāgo yāvad adhodigbhāga iti digbhāgabhede sati kathaṃ tadātmakasya paramāṇor ekatvaṃ yokṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:56_0: yady ekaikasya paramāṇor digbhāgabhedo na syād ādityodaye katham anyatra chāyā bhavaty anyatrātapaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:56_1: na hi tasyānyaḥ pradeśo 'sti yatrātapo na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:56_2: āvaraṇaṃ ca kathaṃ bhavati paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantareṇa yadi digbhāgabhedo neṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:56_3: na hi kaścid api paramāṇoḥ parabhāgo 'sti yatrāgamanād anyenānyasya pratighātaḥ syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:56_4: asati ca pratighāte sarveṣāṃ samānadeśatvāt sarvaḥ saṃghātaḥ [Vvs_8] paramāṇumātraḥ syād ity uktaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:56_5: kim evaṃ neṣyate piṇḍasya te chāyāvṛtī na paramāṇor iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:56_6: kiṃ khalu paramāṇubhyo 'nyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate yasya te syātāṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:57_0: anyo na piṇḍaś cen na tasya te // 14 //
SA20vasvvmsu:58_0: yadi nānyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ piṇḍa iṣyate na te tasyeti siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:58_1: saṃniveśaparikalpa eṣaḥ paramāṇuḥ saṃghāta iti vā /
SA20vasvvmsu:59_0: kim anayā cintayā lakṣaṇaṃ / tu rūpādi yadi na pratiṣidhyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:59_1: kiṃ punas teṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ / cakṣurādiviṣayatvaṃ nīlāditvaṃ ca /
SA20vasvvmsu:59_2: tad evedaṃ saṃpradhāryate / yat tac cakṣurādīnāṃ viṣayo nīlapītādikam iṣyate kiṃ tad ekaṃ dravyam atha vā tad anekam iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:60_0: ekatve na krameṇetir yugapan na grahāgrahau /
SA20vasvvmsu:60_1: vicchinnānekavṛttiś ca sūkṣmānīkṣā ca no bhavet // 15 //
SA20vasvvmsu:61_0: yadi yāvad vicchinnaṃ nānekaṃ cakṣuṣo viṣayas tad ekaṃ dravyaṃ kalpyate pṛthivyāṃ krameṇetir na syād gamanam ity arthaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:61_2: arvāgbhāgasya ca grahaṇaṃ parabhāgasya cāgrahaṇaṃ yugapan na syāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:61_3: na hi tasyaiva tadānīṃ grahaṇaṃ cāgrahaṇaṃ ca yuktam /
SA20vasvvmsu:61_4: vicchinnasya cānekasya hastyaśvādikasyaikatra vṛttir na syād yatraiva hy ekaṃ tatraivāparam iti kathaṃ tayor viccheda iṣyate /
SA20vasvvmsu:61_5: kathaṃ vā tad ekaṃ yat prāptaṃ ca tābhyāṃ na ca prāptam antarāle tac chūnyagrahaṇāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:61_6: sūkṣmāṇāṃ caudakajantūnāṃ sthūlaiḥ samānarūpāṇām anīkṣaṇaṃ na syād /
SA20vasvvmsu:61_7: yadi lakṣaṇabhedād eva dravyāntaratvaṃ kalpyate nānyathā /
SA20vasvvmsu:61_9: sa caiko na sidhyati / tasyāsiddhau rūpādīnāṃ cakṣurādiviṣayatvam asiddham iti siddhaṃ vijñaptimātraṃ bhavatīti /
SA20vasvvmsu:62_0: pramāṇavaśād astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā nirdhāryate sarveṣāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ gariṣṭam ity asaty arthe katham iyaṃ buddhir bhavati pratyakṣam iti /
SA20vasvvmsu:65_1: na so 'rtho dṛśyate tasya pratyakṣatvaṃ kathaṃ mataṃ // 16 //
SA20vasvvmsu:66_0_0: yadā ca sā pratyakṣabuddhir bhavatīdaṃ me pratyakṣam iti tadā na so 'rtho dṛśyate
SA20vasvvmsu:66_0_1: manovijñānenaiva paricchedāc cakṣurvijñānasya ca tadā niruddhatvād iti kathaṃ tasya
SA20vasvvmsu:66_1: viśeṣeṇa tu kṣaṇikasya viṣayasya tadānīṃ [Vvs_9] niruddham evaṃ tad rūpaṃ rasādikaṃ vā /
SA20vasvvmsu:67_0: nānanubhūtaṃ manovijñānena smaryata ity avaśyam arthānubhavena bhavitavyaṃ tac ca darśanam ity evaṃ tadviṣayasya rūpādeḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ mataṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:69_0: vināpy arthena yathārthābhāsā cakṣurvijñānādikā vijñaptir utpadyate tathoktaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:71_0: tato hi vijñapteḥ smṛtisaṃprayuktā tatpratibhāsaiva rūpādivikalpikā manovijñaptir utpadyata iti na smṛtyutpādād arthānubhavaḥ sidhyati /
SA20vasvvmsu:71_1: yadi yathā svapne vijñaptir abhūtārthaviṣayā tathā jāgrato 'pi syāt tathaiva tadabhāvaṃ lokaḥ svayam avagacchet /
SA20vasvvmsu:71_2: na caivaṃ bhavati / tasmān na svapna ivārthopalabdhiḥ sarvā nirarthikā /
SA20vasvvmsu:73_0: evaṃ vitathavikalpābhyāsavāsanānidrayā prasupto lokaḥ svapna ivābhūtam arthaṃ paśyan na prabuddhas tadabhāvaṃ yathāvan nāvagacchati /
SA20vasvvmsu:73_1: yadā tu tatpratipakṣalokottaranirvikalpajñānalābhāt prabuddho bhavati tadā tatpṛṣṭhalabdhaśuddhalaukikajñānasaṃmukhībhāvād viṣayābhāvaṃ yathāvad avagacchatīti samānam etat /
SA20vasvvmsu:74_0: yadi svasaṃtānapariṇāmaviśeṣād eva satvānām arthapratibhāsā vijñaptaya utpadyante nārthaviśeṣāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:74_1: tadā ya eṣa pāpakalyāṇamitrasaṃparkāt sadasaddharmaśravaṇāc ca vijñaptiniyamaḥ sattvānāṃ sa kathaṃ sidhyati asati sadasatsaṃparke taddeśanāyāṃ ca /
SA20vasvvmsu:76_0: sarveṣāṃ hi sattvānām anyonyavijñaptyādhipatyena mitho vijñapter niyamo bhavati yathāyogaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:76_1: mitha iti parasparataḥ / ataḥ saṃtānāntaravijñaptiviśeṣāt saṃtānāntare vijñaptiviśeṣa utpadyate nārthaviśeṣāt /
SA20vasvvmsu:76_2: yadi yathā svapne nirarthikā vijñaptir evaṃ jāgrato 'pi syāt kasmāt kuśalākuśalasamudācāro suptāsuptayos tulyaṃ phalam iṣṭāniṣṭam āyatyāṃ na bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:78_0: idam atra kāraṇāṃ na tv arthasadbhāvaḥ //
SA20vasvvmsu:79_0: yadi vijñāptimātram evedaṃ na kasyacit kāyo 'sti na vāk //
SA20vasvvmsu:80_0: katham upakramyamāṇānām aurabhrikādibhir urabhrādīnāṃ [Vvs_10] maraṇaṃ bhavti /
SA20vasvvmsu:80_1: atatkṛte vā tanmaraṇe katham aurabhrikādīnāṃ prāṇātipātāvadyena yogo bhavati /
SA20vasvvmsu:82_1: ṛddhivan manovaśāc ca / yathā sāraṇasyāryamahākātyāyanādhiṣṭhānāt svapnadarśanaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:82_3: tathā paravijñaptiviśeṣādhipatyāt pareṣāṃ jīvitendriyavirodhinī kācid vikriyotpadyate yayā sabhāgasaṃtativicchedākhyaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavatīti veditavyaṃ /
SA20vasvvmsu:84_1: manodaṇḍasya hi mahāsāvadyatvaṃ sādhayatā bhagavatopālir gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ /
SA20vasvvmsu:84_2: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kena tāni daṇḍakāraṇyāni mātaṅgāraṇyāni kaliṅgāraṇyāni śūnyāni medhyībhūtāni /
SA20vasvvmsu:84_3: tenoktaṃ / śrutaṃ me bho gautama ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣeṇeti /
SA20vasvvmsu:85_0: manodaṇḍo mahāvadyaḥ kathaṃ vā tena sidhyati // 20 //
SA20vasvvmsu:86_0_0: yady evaṃ kalpyate / tadabhiprasannair amānuṣais tadvāsinaḥ sattvā utsāditā na tv
SA20vasvvmsu:86_0_1: ṛṣīṇāṃ manaḥpradoṣān mṛtā ity evaṃ sati kathaṃ tena karmaṇā manodaṇḍaḥ kāyavāgdaṇḍābhyāṃ
SA20vasvvmsu:87_0: yadi vijñaptimātram evedaṃ paracittavidaḥ kiṃ paracittaṃ jānanty atha na /
SA20vasvvmsu:87_1: kiṃ cātaḥ / yadi na jānanti kathaṃ paracittavido bhavanti /
SA20vasvvmsu:91_1: tathā tadajñānāt tadubhayaṃ na yathārthaṃ vitathapratibhāsatayā grāhyagrāhakavikalpasyāprahīṇatvāt /
